Name: 弹炸人2222
About the game: The author of the first game, a bit special， The first person bomber.Welcome to play This game is a bit hard Game: destory walls, pick up props make themselves stronger, clean up all the monsters, then find the door can be customs clearance. keypad key 'w' is forward key 'S' is back key 'A' is Shift to the left key 'D' is Moves to the right key 'SPACE' is place bomb key 'E' is go on pillar key 'Mouse Left' is use equip key '1','2','3' select item (place bomb need select key '1'(blue),use qeuip need select key '2'(red)) move 'mouse' directional control
